qas.question: Which constitution details the role and abilities of the prime minister?
What other considerations are included in the constitution of Bangladesh as regards the prime minister?

answers.text: the process of his/her appointment and dismissal

qas.question: What contry only vaugly outlines the role of prime minister?

context: <a0_0><b2_0>Bangladesh<b2_0/>'s<a0_0/> constitution clearly outlines the functions and powers of the Prime Minister, and also details <a1_0>the process of his/her appointment and dismissal<a1_0/>.
